qas.question: In what year does 'Terra Nova' begin?
How far back in time do people in 'Terra Nova' travel?

What was the first original show on the TNT network?

context: In <b5_0><b9_0>2011<b9_0/><b5_0/>, Spielberg launched <a4_0><b6_0>Falling Skies<b6_0/><a4_0/>, a science fiction television series, on the <a0_0>TNT<a0_0/> network. He developed the series with Robert Rodat and is credited as an executive producer. Spielberg is also producing the <a3_0>Fox<a3_0/> TV series Terra Nova. Terra Nova begins in the year <a1_0><b7_0><b8_0>2149<b8_0/><b7_0/><a1_0/> when all life on the planet Earth is threatened with extinction resulting in scientists opening a door that allows people to travel back <a2_0>85 million years<a2_0/> to prehistoric times. Spielberg also produced The River, Smash, Under the Dome, Extant and The Whispers, as well as a TV adaptation of Minority Report.
